definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: He was suspected to be a loner with difficulty experienced during relationships.
sentences.chinese: 他怀疑是孤家寡人的困难所经历的人际关系。
的确，人类是人际关系型的生物。

sentences.english: Remember that your goal is to build genuine relationships, so don’t approach people just because you think they can help to promote your blog.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为博客才与人交往，要建立真正的人际关系。
维持一份难伺候的人际关系。

sentences.english: you get to actually know people who have network connections.
sentences.chinese: 你可以认识有人际关系网的人。

sentences.english: Things for the Chinese people and selfless advocate, it is interpersonal harmony.
sentences.chinese: 中国人崇尚天下为公和心底无私，故人际关系融洽。

sentences.english: There is so much data even about human relationships like love and sex.
sentences.chinese: 对于性啊爱啊这样的人际关系，数据真的是那么的多。

sentences.english: The door and the bridge are symbols that determine a character of interpersonal relationships.
sentences.chinese: 门和桥象征着人际关系的决定要素。

sentences.english: The language of space was the key sign for degree of intimacy of human relationship.
sentences.chinese: 空间语言是人际关系亲疏程度的重要标志。

sentences.english: In the second place, having a good personal relationship is much nicer than having a degree.
sentences.chinese: 第二，有一个良好的缙人际关系比拥有学位要好得多。

sentences.english: The incumbent must have proven successful inter-personal relationship skills.
sentences.chinese: 必须有成功处理人际关系的技能。

sentences.english: The good life is built with good relationships.
sentences.chinese: 美好人生，从良好的人际关系开始。

sentences.english: If the child is young,talk about relationships, love and respect.
sentences.chinese: 如果孩子年龄比较小，就谈些人际关系，爱和尊重。

sentences.english: The social interaction of China mutual interleave, benefits relation complications.
sentences.chinese: 中国的人际关系互相交错，利益关系复杂。

sentences.english: A：I'm fresh out of school.I know nothing about dealing with people.
sentences.chinese: 我刚从学校毕业，我对处理人际关系一点也不懂。

sentences.english: Relationships, and the conditions for them to flourish .
sentences.chinese: 人际关系的，也具备条件，为他们的成长和发展。

definition: workplace/workforce (of a nation or industry etc)/job market
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
